A quote attributed to Donald Trump was a: in which he supposedly stated that he is a member of a growing population known as flat earth truthers.
The comments made by Trump in response t: where he dismissed the future role of the National Guard and referred to "round earth people" having an agenda.
The source of the claim: CNN.com.de, was investigated and determined to be a fake news website, not affiliated with the legitimate news organization CNN. Additional hints, such as the provided contact number leading to the Westboro Baptist Church, suggested that the website published hoaxes.
